### Data Science Job

One job that involves data science is **Data Scientist** in this lower levels of this job you are mainly doing *Data Wrangling* and *Data visualization*. These tasks are mainly focused on turning raw data into a form that can be used for analysis and create the first graphs and chart that can be used to interpret the data. For more information click [here.](https://www.sas.com/en_us/insights/analytics/what-is-a-data-scientist.html)
